
configure -opensource -debug-and-release -opengl desktop -mp -nomake examples -nomake tests -confirm-license -platform winrt-x64-msvc2017

(this makes only qtbase)
nmake module-qtbase
nmake module-qtbase-install_subtargets

nmake module-qtsvg
nmake module-qtsvg-install_subtargets

(this makes the whole thing, takes a long time)
nmake 
nmake install

D:\SPUD\qwt-6.1.4\doc\html\qwtinstall.html


configure -release -nomake examples -nomake tests -opensource



QT5 include file location changes:

<QtGui/QWidget>    -->>     <QtWidgets/QWidget>    118 places

<QtGui/QDialog>    -->>     <QtWidgets/QDialog>    78 places

<QtGui/QMessageBox>    -->>     <QtWidgets/QMessageBox>    100 places

<QtGui/Q    -->>     <QtWidgets/Q    1776 places   ------ had to revert the ones below that did not move

....


These did not move:

Qpainter 
QColor 
QImage
QValidator
QPixmap
QMouseEvent

QFontMetrics
QFontDatabase
QDesktopServices
QFocusEvent
QBitmap
QtGui/QMatrix
